query:
SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM time_series_data) as time_series_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM research_publications) as publications_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM economic_events) as events_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM glossary_terms) as glossary_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM indicator_definitions) as indicators_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM data_sources) as sources_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users) as users_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM provenance_ledger_full) as provenance_count;
